Text: Mugwo̩ru wa kʼe̩ gugu ef ebutu,
Agbone̩tane̩ e-wa le̩—odu-wñ ko̩ Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du—
Tak uwe̩ kakini, Omi achʼodu one̩ ogbegbele̩,
Todule̩ e̩ gbʼe-i ke, uwe̩ kʼe̩ tʼo̩la-we̩ no̩ ñw e̩wñ ube̩do̩,
Todule̩ oñ e̩bie̩ne̩ awa bʼe̩ ma,
Ojuju-we̩ kʼe̩ nyi wewe wewe le̩ fʼe̩ hia me̩;
Abe̩le̩ oñ e̩wñ kʼe̩ te̩tachʼakanya uko̩lo̩-wñ ade̩ ñw e̩,
